More Information

Lattice Education Competence Center

Your training platform around Low-Power-FPGAs

The use of FPGA technology is growing rapidly, finding new applications in the embedded world and beyond. FPGAs are often the best design choice for cost, power consumption and ease-of-use. Developers must have a solid competency in FPGA technology and design approaches as well as specific expertise to solve their design challenges.

We constantly study the market, listen to developers and work closely with FPGA manufacturers like Lattice to develop training tailored to meet today's and tomorrow's needs.

Start your journey
right now with us!

You can click on one of the sections and start your journey

Application

Learn and explore how to effectively implement your specific application

Optimization

Learn how to optimize your FPGA / CPLD Design

Methodology

Learn the latest design methodologies to get the most out of the Technology selected

Tools

Learn the latest Lattice Design Tools available to effectively design Lattice FPGAs / CPLDs

Architecture

Learn the latest Lattice FPGA / CPLD Architectures.

Different people - Different needs.
Pick the right training format for your needs

Webinar

Our free on-line webinars address selected topics related to Lattice FPGAs. Our webinars provide you with all the information you need to successfully start your FPGA design.

Cost: Free
Format: Live Online or Recorded
Duration: 1 day

Seminar

Our free face-to-face seminars address selected topics related to Lattice FPGAs. Discuss your specific project requirements with the trainer. Our seminars provide you with all the information you need to successfully start your FPGA design.

Cost: Free
Format: Live Event
Duration: 1 - 2 hours

Face2Face

Experienced trainers conduct our face-to-face trainings either in selected hotels or directly at your location. Intensive exercises facilitate the introduction to the latest FPGA technology.

Cost: $500 - $3500
Format: Live Event
Duration: 1 to 5 days

Shorties

Our Shorties series focuses on the analysis, definition and the implementation of special, selected tasks. Save time and use the solutions presented for your projects.

Cost: $99 - $149
Format: Live Online or Recorded
Duration: 3 - 4 hours

Online

Browse through our extensive video library and find suitable solutions to make it easier for you to implement your special task.

Cost: $500 - $3500
Format: Live Online or Recorded
Duration: 1 to 5 days

Inhouse

Use our experts not only to get to know the FPGA development process on site but also to work on your project-specific tasks.

Cost: Individual
Format: On-Site
Duration: Individual

Latest Training Modules Available

Shorties: Radiant Design Flow

This Shortie demonstrates how to create a new Radiant software project, customize IP using IP Catalog, verify functionality with simulation, set timing and location constraints, process the design, analyse power consumption, analyse static timing, create on-chip debug logic.

Explore

Intensive Workshop: Crosslink NX

CrossLink™-NX family of low-power FPGAs can be used in a wide range of applications, and are optimized for bridging and processing needs in Embedded Vision applications – supporting a variety of high bandwidth sensor and display interfaces, video processing and machine learning inferencing. It is built on Lattice Nexus FPGA platform, using low-power 28 nm FD-SOI technology. It combines the flexibility of an FPGA with the low power and high reliability (due to extremely low SER) of FD-SOI technology.

Explore

The design of digital circuits in this scale needs a powerful hardware description
